description: The Snugg Microsoft Surface 1 & 2 leather wallets are here! A Black PU leather premium case which has been designed for the Microsoft Surface and is License Accredited features a card slot, larger pocket, high quality soft nubuck fibre interior and a magnetic closure to secure the Microsoft Surface 1 & 2 tightly in place when in use. The small card slot is useful for carrying business cards, headphones or USB sticks. We have also included a larger pocket at the back of the wallet for storing pieces of paper, charging cables or even your phone. The Snugg Microsoft Surface 1 & 2 wallet has been specially designed to carry the Surface with the keyboard attached but also provides a snug fit without the keyboard. This case will protect your device from small bumps and scratches whilst being transported in a larger bag or tucked under your arm. This case fits both the Surface RT and the Surface Pro.
title: Snugg Microsoft Surface 1 & 2 Leather Wallet Case in Black for RT and Pro - High Quality Case with Card Slot, Pocket and Premium Nubuck Fibre Interior
